    CheckParameters(string[])

    Check inputter number of parameters for peek If not 2 or 3 parameters, exception thrown

    Declaration

    | Edit this page View Source

    Compile()

    processes array parameters for peek for compile: split parameter list into parameters by a space assing peek variable with first index create peek parameter list: -assigning correct values of row size(rowS), column size(colS) Throw command exception if incorrect number of pararemeters passed set array variable name

    Declaration
    public override void Compile()
    Overrides
    AppArray.Compile()
    | Edit this page View Source

    Execute()

    processes array parameters for peek for execution: evaluates the expressions for row size, column size and poke value tries to parse values to int throw Argument exception if row size(rowS) and column size (colS) cannot be parsed for int and real array try to: parse as int or real - throws parser exception if it cannot if it can be parsed call get int/real array and update peek variable with value int or real

    Declaration
    public override void Execute()
    Overrides
    AppArray.Execute()
